parts: Can you show me replacement nibs for waterman pen

content.result:
# 【0†How do I order a new nib for my Waterman pen?†help.waterman.com】
We can offer you the complete front end as a spare part for the Waterman current models according to the availability mentioned in the chart below. Please note that the nibs are not offered separately, but are offered with the complete front end. For some models, such as Waterman Exception or Carène, due to the specificities of the model, we ...
# 【1†Waterman Fountain Pen Nibs | The Online Pen Company†www.theonlinepencompany.com】
Replacement fountain pen nibs for Waterman pens, including the Carene, the Hemisphere, the Expert and all of the other Waterman models.. Each waterman nib is engraved with their logo, and supplied as an entire nib section including the finger grip. They are all made from different materials and finishes and will only fit the pen they were designed for.
# 【2†Amazon.com: Waterman Nib Replacement†www.amazon.com】
30pcs Fountain Pen Nibs Replacement, Fountain Pen Nibs Spare Pen Nibs Stainless Steel Universal Pen Tip for Writing, Painting, Signing, 6 Size(5 Pack) $7.89 $ 7. 89. ... Jaymo Replacement for Waterman 834254 - Measures 4.4 in / 112 mm Long - Ballpoint Pen Refill - 6 Black. 4.1 out of 5 stars. 202.
# 【3†Waterman | Nibs†www.nibs.com】
Waterman. Since its inception in 1884, Waterman has remained a cornerstone in the realm of fountain pens, celebrated for its commitment to craftsmanship and timeless design. With a rich heritage spanning over a century, Waterman continues to uphold its legacy of producing sophisticated and exquisitely designed writing instruments. Pioneering ...
# 【4†Replacement Fountain Pen Nibs - Parker, Lamy, Waterman, Pelikan | Pen ...†www.penheaven.com】
We stock a wide range of replacement nibs from brands such as Parker, Lamy, Pelikan, Waterman, TWSBI in different nib sizes. Click to shop. ... Waterman Hemisphere Fountain Pen Nib - Gold Plated. £24.50 (17) Waterman Hemisphere Fountain Pen Nib - Chrome. £22.00 (10) Waterman Carene Fountain Pen Nib - 18k Gold.
# 【5†Replacing The Nib On A Vintage Waterman Fountain Pen.†www.youtube.com】
How to replace a nib on a vintage Waterman fountain pen. In this video I swap a scratchy old nib with a modern Kaweco Sport nib.Pen repair, fixing a fountain...
# 【6†Waterman Hemisphere Fountain Pen Nib - Chrome | Pen Heaven†www.penheaven.com】
Gives a finer line than medium as expected with the same quality of script production. Overview This replacement nib could be a quick and easy way to upgrade your existing Waterman Hemisphere fountain pen. Stainless steel construction finished with chrome plating to match chrome trim pens.
# 【7†Pen Nibs- Replacement Fountain Pen Nibs & Tips - The Pen Company†www.thepencompany.com】
Most nibs are very easily changed and either push on or screw into place. If the nib you are looking for is not shown below please contact us. £7.20. Z50 Nib. Lamy. £17.95. Zoom 101 Nib Unit Spare Part. Tombow. £40.85.
# 【8†Waterman's Nib Exchange Program†help.waterman.com】
Should you realize the nib of your new Waterman fountain pen is not entirely suited to your writing style, Waterman offers a free nib exchange service for any nib of the same value, provided the pen is from our current range and the nib and front end of your Waterman pen are in pristine condition. We also require that the application is made ...
# 【9†Waterman Pen Nibs for Expert, Carene, Exception, Hemisphere - Penbox†www.penbox.co.uk】
18k Waterman Elegance Nibs, £99 : 18k Waterman Carene, £85 : 18k Gold Charleston Nibs, £85 : Perspective Nibs, £44 : Waterman Expert Nibs, £44 : Hemisphere Nibs, £32 : Note: GT = gold trim and ST = silver trim. All Waterman pen nibs are supplied as a complete front end and screw directly into the barrel of the pen.
# 【10†Replacement Nib For Laureat - Waterman - The Fountain Pen Network†www.fountainpennetwork.com】
The Expert 2 two tone nibs look lovely in a Laureat version two. I have two, red and green swirl with EF Expert 2 two tone nibs. I guess this is semi-franken, though. I have also used an older Waterman Ideal number two 14K nib in a Laureat version one. It works perfectly and I like it. The pen is a tortoise with red and black horizantal bands.
# 【11†Waterman Expert Fountain Pen Nib - Gold Plated | Pen Heaven†www.penheaven.com】
As described, writes well with good feed. This replacement nib is a perfect fit for my existing pen. Writes smoothly. Overview This replacement nib could be a quick and easy way to upgrade your existing Waterman Expert fountain pen. Stainless steel construction finished with gold plating to match gold trim pens.

Code: S0968460. €44.50. Replaceable Waterman Hemisphere CT nib "B" - new version.
# 【13†Replacement Fountain Pen Nibs and Nib Units - The Goulet Pen Company†www.gouletpens.com】

# 【16†Replacing nibs for Waterman Phileas? - The Fountain Pen Network†www.fountainpennetwork.com】
I reckon it is an ideal ink for lefties. Regarding the price of the nibs and pens, I reckon a Phileas nib would set you back between $15 and $20, excluding the replacement of it, although that is something so simple anyone could do it. Therefore, it seems worthwhile to me buying the whole pen. I would anyway. Quote.

# 【18†Replacing A Waterman Laureat Nib Feed - The Fountain Pen Network†www.fountainpennetwork.com】
I needed both the nib and the feed, because I was putting two Laureat IIs together from parts. I had two barrels, two matching caps and two sections. I just needed the nib and feed for each pen. The Laureat I (flat cap jewel) uses same size nib and feed as Laureat II (domed cap jewel). Edited November 6, 2018 by pajaro.

# Fountain Pen Nibs

Has the nib become damaged on your favourite fountain pen, or perhaps you want to try a different width such as broad or oblique? We stock replacement nibs for Parker, Lamy and Laban fountain pens. Parker nibs are available for the Sonnet range only in gold plated (matches gold trim), 18k rhodium plated and chrome (matches silver trim). Lamy nibs are suitable for all ranges, and are available in an extra fine, left handed and unique ‘beginners’ version. See our 【121†comparison of nib widths】.

[Image 4: Waterman nibs] 

# Replacement Waterman pen nibs.

Waterman fountain pen nibs for the Expert, Carene, Exception, Edson, Serenite, Charleston, Elegance, Perspective and Hemisphere fountain pens. Most nib grades posted on the same or next working day.

Model Waterman Nib Grades  
EF  F  M  B  Stub  OF  OB Images  
18k Edson: £345. • • • • • • • 【8† 】  
【9† 】  
18k Serenite: £329. • 【10† 】

【12† 】

【14† 】

【18† 】

【20† 】

【22† 】  
Hemisphere, GT or ST: £32. • • • • 【23† 】  
【24† 】  

Standard nibs have a rounded writing point which gives smooth, free flowing writing and a uniform line width. Oblique nibs are cut obliquely which allows greater line variation. Italic nibs are manufactured with a straight cut tip. This gives a thick vertical line and a thin line width to horizontal writing strokes.

18k Serenite Nib, £329:  Stub, ST   1 2

18k Exception Nibs (Large Models), £169:  Medium, GT Medium, ST Extra Fine, GT Extra Fine, ST Fine, GT  Fine, ST  Broad, GT Broad, ST Stub, GT  Stub, ST  Fine Oblique, GT Fine Oblique, ST Broad Oblique, GT Broad Oblique, ST  1 2

18k Waterman Elegance Nibs, £99:  Medium, ST Medium, GT Fine, ST Extra Fine, ST  1

18k Waterman Carene, £85:  Medium, GT  Medium, ST  Extra Fine, GT Extra Fine, ST Fine, GT  Fine, ST  Broad, GT  Broad, ST  Stub, GT  Stub, ST  Fine Oblique, GT Fine Oblique, ST Broad Oblique, GT Broad Oblique, ST  1 2

18k Gold Charleston Nibs, £85:  Medium, GT Medium, ST Extra Fine, GT Extra Fine, ST Fine, GT  Fine, ST  Broad, GT  Broad, ST  Stub, GT  Stub, ST   1 2

Perspective Nibs, £44:  Medium, GT  Medium, ST  Extra Fine, GT Extra Fine, ST Fine, GT  Fine, ST  Broad, GT  Broad, ST   1 2

Waterman Expert Nibs, £44:  Medium, GT  Medium, ST  Extra Fine, GT Extra Fine, ST Fine, GT Fine, ST Broad, GT  Broad, ST   1 2

Hemisphere Nibs, £32:  Medium, GT  Medium, ST  Extra Fine, GT Extra Fine, ST Fine, GT  Fine, ST  Broad, GT  Broad, ST   1 2

Note: GT = gold trim and ST = silver trim.

All Waterman pen nibs are supplied as a complete front end and screw directly into the barrel of the pen.

#### Gift Wrap 

We offer a professional giftwrap service to complement your pen or leather journal. Simply check the giftwrap option on the product page before you add to basket (a charge of £2.75 will be added).

We use a premium silver giftwrap paper with a subtle two-tone patterned effect, and a hand tied silver ribbon. We also include a matching gift tag, which can be appended with a message of your choice. Simply add your message to the text box when you reach your basket. Items are giftwrapped individually i.e. if you order several items only the specific item requested will be wrapped.

We do not include any paperwork inside the giftwrapped item. If you select a different delivery name to your billing details, we add a gift receipt which hides all prices.

content.title: Waterman Expert Fountain Pen Nib - Gold Plated | Pen Heaven

parts:
You can find replacement nibs for Waterman pens from several sources. Waterman offers replacement nibs for their models such as the Expert, Carene, Hemisphere, and more. These nibs are typically sold as complete sections, including the grip and feed, and can be found in various finishes like gold or chrome to match your pen’s design.

Here are some options:
1. **The Online Pen Company** offers a variety of Waterman nibs, including those for models like the Hemisphere, Expert, and Carene. These nibs are supplied as an entire nib section and are available in different materials and finishes【7†source】.
   
2. **Pen Heaven** stocks replacement nibs for various Waterman models. For example, they have the Waterman Expert nib in gold plating. These nibs include the nib, feed, and grip section【8†source】【10†source】.
   
3. **Penbox** also offers a range of Waterman nibs, including those for the Expert, Carene, and Hemisphere models. They provide detailed options regarding nib grades and finishes【9†source】.

These suppliers offer international shipping, so you can get the nibs delivered to your location. Make sure to check the compatibility with your specific pen model before purchasing.
Are there any others that are not made by waterman

content.text:
View fullsize

[Image 2: Franklin-Christoph fountain pens use JoWo nibs, so it’s easy to amass a large collection of custom-ground F-C nib units that you can swap between all of your JoWo-compatible pens.] 

【8†Franklin-Christoph fountain pens†www.franklin-christoph.com】 use JoWo nibs, so it’s easy to amass a large collection of custom-ground F-C nib units that you can swap between all of your JoWo-compatible pens. 

### Easy: JoWo, Bock, and TWSBI Interchangeable Nib Units 

These days, the majority of pen makers no longer manufacture their own nibs in-house, and instead purchase nibs from third-party companies JoWo, Bock, and to a lesser degree, Schmidt (though I find Schmidt nibs excellent and don’t know why they’re not more widely used). While some people complain about monotony and the lack of expressiveness in how these modern nibs write, there is one key advantage to this uniformity: interchangeability. Many, if not most, pens that accept standard JoWo or Bock nibs use a default nib unit (i.e., a nib and feed seated in a threaded housing) that can easily be unscrewed and used in another compatible pen. Once you start custom-grinding these nib units or gather the range of nib sizes, it becomes a very versatile platform that can allow you to thoroughly enjoy your pen collection. 

[Image 3: The process for swapping out a JoWo or Bock compatible nib unit is mostly the same between brands. Gently grasp the nib and feed and turn counter-clockwise to unscrew the unit.] 

The process for swapping out a JoWo or Bock compatible nib unit is mostly the same between brands. Gently grasp the nib and feed and turn counter-clockwise to unscrew the unit. 

The process itself is simple. First, if the pen you are working on is a cartridge-converter model, remove the converter. Then, gently grasp the nib and feed and turn the nib unit counter-clockwise to remove it. Select your new nib unit, insert it into the section, and rotate clockwise until secure. Do not overtighten, as this can misalign the tines of the nib, at best, and cause stress damage to the nib housing, at worst, in which case you will need a replacement. 

View fullsize

[Image 4: Opus 88 pens, which are Japanese-style eyedroppers, add one slight wrinkle to the process. There is a small o-ring attached to the bottom of the nib unit housing. If replacing with a non-Opus nib unit, don’t forget to transfer the o-ring as well. It sits on the plastic “stem” and is easily removable.] 

Opus 88 pens, which are Japanese-style eyedroppers, add one slight wrinkle to the process. There is a small o-ring attached to the bottom of the nib unit housing. If replacing with a non-Opus nib unit, don’t forget to transfer the o-ring as well. It sits on the plastic “stem” and is easily removable. 

TWSBI nib units are slightly different, though still simple. On the 【9†TWSBI Diamond 580】, you simply unscrew the front section of the pen and slide the nib unit out of the plastic cover (shown here in red but clear on most current 580 models). Insert your new nib unit and reassemble. 【10†Because TWSBI sells spare nib units】 for the express purpose of allowing you to easily switch nibs between pens, you don’t have to worry about voiding your manufacturer’s warranty or otherwise causing unintended damage. I own several spare TWSBI nibs, some of which have been custom ground to specialty nibs such as architects. 

【11† View fullsize †images.squarespace-cdn.com】 

【12† View fullsize †images.squarespace-cdn.com】 

Editor’s Note: There has been a lot of press recently about a manufacturing defect that has caused cracks in JoWo nib housings. While I’ve been lucky and have not yet found the issue in any of my personal pens, JoWo has released a series of announcements discussing how they plan to fix the problem. If you have been inspecting your JoWo nib units and discover cracks, 【13†please reach out to Meister Nibs, the U.S. JoWo distributor†meisternibs.com】. 

### Intermediate: Pulling and Setting Friction-Fit Nibs 

But what about pens that don’t use interchangeable nib units? Well, the nibs on those pens are, for the most part, equally “swappable” and the process is no more mechanically complex than taking a small square of rubber or other grippy material, grasping the nib and feed, and pulling both out of the front end of the pen’s section using a steady motion. You replace a nib the same way, though you need to be pay attention when reinserting the nib and feed as some pens have grooves or “guides” that determine exactly how the nib is supposed to fit. 

View fullsize

[Image 5: The nibs on some pens, especially those with proprietary in-house nibs like this Platinum 3776, do not come in a housing, meaning that the nib and feed sit directly inside the custom section.] 

The nibs on some pens, especially those with proprietary in-house nibs like this Platinum 3776, do not come in a housing, meaning that the nib and feed sit directly inside the custom section. 

So why do I have this categorized as requiring an “intermediate” skill level? Honestly, it’s more about confidence than skill. Sometimes, things don’t go 100% as expected. Old ink residue may cause the nib and feed to get stuck in the section, and you may find yourself having to pull fairly hard or jiggle the nib a bit (gently!) to dislodge it from the pen. Any time you apply force, you run some risk of misaligning the nib tines or cracking the feed. Changing friction-fit nibs properly requires some patience, a willingness to engage in a bit of trial-and-error, and an “intermediate” understanding of how fountain pens work. Finally, keep in mind that if your pen breaks and you can’t fix it on your own, the manufacturer might consider removing or swapping the nib on a pen without an interchangeable nib unit to be a “modification” that voids your warranty. That’s not to say that you won’t be able to find someone who can fix the pen, but you will likely have to pay for it. 

View fullsize

[Image 6: From the top: Platinum 3776 UEF in Schon Black Ultem, via Flexible Nib Factory JoWo housing; Pilot PO Nib in Newton Shinobi, via same housing; Platinum 3776 in an Opus 88 Jazz, via same housing.] 

From the top: 【14†Platinum 3776 UEF】 in 【15†Schon Black Ultem†www.schondsgn.com】, via Flexible Nib Factory JoWo housing; 【16†Pilot PO Nib】 in 【17†Newton Shinobi】, via same housing; Platinum 3776 in an 【18†Opus 88 Jazz†vanness1938.com】, via same housing. 

### Expert: Custom Nib Housings for Maximum Pen Hacking 

The last topic I plan to discuss combines the two techniques discussed above in a manner that allows you to create your own custom nib units. 【19†Flexible Nib Factory†www.flexiblenib.com】 sells 【20†custom nib housings†flexiblenib.com】 designed to pair proprietary nibs and feeds (i.e. Platinum, Pilot, Pelikan, Sailor, etc.) with JoWo and Bock-compatible pens. For example, I pulled a friction-fit medium 14k Platinum nib from a standard Platinum 3776 fountain pen, and inserted both the nib and feed into a JoWo-compatible Flexible Nib Factory housing, which I then seated in an Opus 88 Jazz. The one drawback is that these custom housings won’t accept a converter, so you will need to use a piston filler, eyedropper, or bulkfiller-style (i.e. Conid) pen. Opus 88 pens work great for these types of modifications, though with certain brands like Platinum you may have to trim the plastic end on the back of the feed in order to allow the Japanese-style eyedropper system to close. 

View fullsize

[Image 7: A nib unit disassembled. Using Flexible Nib Factory housings, you can pull, for example, a nib and feed from a Platinum 3776 and insert it into the custom housing designed to fit a JoWo or Bock pen. It’s less complex than it looks.] 

A nib unit disassembled. Using Flexible Nib Factory housings, you can pull, for example, a nib and feed from a Platinum 3776 and insert it into the custom housing designed to fit a JoWo or Bock pen. It’s less complex than it looks. 

A word of caution: customizing fountain pens in this way is addictive. Since building my FrankenJazz, I’ve also moved another Platinum 14k UEF (Ultra Extra-Fine) nib and a Pilot PO (Posting) nib into JoWo housings, which are now in a Schon Black Ultem and Shawn Newton Shinobi. I’m eyeing several other nibs in my collection that don’t get much use in their current setup…

This post does not contain a
content.title: Swapping Fountain Pen Nibs: From Easy to Expert — The Gentleman Stationer

parts:
You can use third-party nibs from companies like JoWo, Bock, and Schmidt, which are known for their interchangeability and quality. These nibs can fit into various pen brands and models, including Waterman, provided the pen's nib housing is compatible. JoWo and Bock nib units, for example, can be easily swapped in and out of pens that support this modular system. This allows for a high degree of customization and flexibility in your writing experience【16†source】.

For purchasing, websites like Cult Pens and The Pen Company offer a wide range of these nibs.
